name: Rainbow Hamster
description: How great is it to lay on a beach and to drink a fresh cocktail. It is so good to be friends with the Sun that warms up your sides... What a good mood! This is the paradise where find himself our funny hamster Alex Rainbow. Unfortunately, his relaxing was not so long, terrible monsters have raided and hided the Sun into an iron cage. Our Alex Rainbow has never stuck up for his friends! He is coming to save the Sun right now!
